difficultyModal.title: Update Difficulty Level
difficultyModal.subtitle: Select your current AI usage level
difficultyModal.question: How much do you use AI in your work environment?
difficultyModal.nextLevelHint: If you think you can do the next level, select a higher option.
difficultyModal.updateError: Error updating difficulty. Please try again.

radar.title: AI Competencies Radar
radar.description: Visualization of your strengths by functional area based on your questionnaire. Each dimension is evaluated on a scale of 0 to 100 points.
radar.difficultyInfo: Your scores are normalized according to your difficulty level. The maximum possible for your level is {{max}} points.
radar.difficultyAdvance: As you advance in your AI knowledge, you will be able to reach higher levels.

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Your theoretical understanding of AI, fundamental concepts and terminology.

application.title: Application
application.description: Your ability to implement AI in real use cases.

productivity.title: Productivity
productivity.description: How you use AI to optimize your daily work.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Your vision of the strategic impact of AI in your organization.

investment.title: Investment
investment.description: Your willingness to invest in AI tools and training.

adoptionDescriptions.excellent: Excellent AI adoption level. You have effectively integrated AI tools in multiple areas of your work.
adoptionDescriptions.good: Good AI adoption level. You have started integrating AI tools in some aspects of your work.
adoptionDescriptions.medium: Medium AI adoption level. You are exploring some AI tools in your daily work.
adoptionDescriptions.basic: Basic AI adoption level. You have started experimenting with some AI tools.
adoptionDescriptions.beginner: Beginner AI adoption level. There are many opportunities to start integrating AI into your work.

knowledgeDescriptions.excellent: Excellent technical understanding of AI. You answered correctly {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions ({{score}}%).
knowledgeDescriptions.good: Good technical understanding of AI. You answered correctly {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions ({{score}}%).
knowledgeDescriptions.medium: Medium understanding of AI. You answered correctly {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions ({{score}}%).
knowledgeDescriptions.basic: Basic understanding of AI. You answered correctly {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions ({{score}}%).
knowledgeDescriptions.beginner: Beginner understanding of AI. You answered correctly {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions ({{score}}%). There are significant opportunities to expand your technical understanding.

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.improvementDescription: Your score in {{dimension}} is {{score}} points. Focus on developing this area to balance your competency profile.
recommendations.technicalDescription: With {{correct}}/{{total}} correct answers ({{score}}%), focus on better understanding AI fundamentals and best practices.
recommendations.adoptionDescription: Explore more AI tools and look for opportunities to integrate them into your daily workflow.

countries.title: GenAI Adoption in Spanish-speaking Countries
countries.description: AI Adoption and Implementation Index (AIPI) by country. Compare your adoption level with the average in your region.

methodology.title: Source and Methodology
methodology.aipiDescription: The AI Adoption and Implementation Index (AIPI) evaluates the level of artificial intelligence adoption in Spanish-speaking countries based on enterprise implementation metrics, personal use, technology investment and public policies.
methodology.sourcesDescription:
• Enterprise adoption studies (2023-2024)
• Personal AI usage surveys
• Technology investment by country
• Digitalization public policies
• Technology innovation indexes
methodology.updateDescription: Data updated quarterly. Last update: January 2025
